## IFastifyMetrics.initMetricsInRegistry() method

Initialize metrics in registries. Useful if you call `registry.clear()` to register metrics in regisitries once again

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initMetricsInRegistry(): void;
```

<b>Returns:</b>

void
